ques: This used to be on paper, now you get it on your phone. It can help you find a route, So you don’t get lost and groan.
I show all the world in just one swirl.Now answer the question, What can I be?
My first is in ocean, but never in sea. My whole is a creature that hunts through the night.
Liar’s nose, Liar’s eyes. Never shifting, ever staring, Not a thought or feeling sharing.
Shiny and metallic, But not a piece of bling. They’re there to make a noise, Shake them and they will ring.
